**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Goodyera oblongifolia</b></i> is a species of orchid known by the common names <b>western rattlesnake plantain</b> and <b>giant rattlesnake plantain</b>. It is native to much of North America, particularly in the mountains of the western United States and Canada, from Alaska to northern Mexico, as well as in the Great Lakes region, Maine, Quebec and the Canadian Maritime Provinces.</p><p><i>Goodyera oblongifolia</i></p>...
